  | uppercase | lowercase | English  |
  |:------------:|:--------------------:|:------------:|
  | A | $\alpha$ | alpha  |
  | B | $\beta$ | beta  |
  | $\Gamma$ | $\gamma$ | gamma  |
  | $\Delta$ | $\delta$ | delta  |
  | E | $\epsilon$ | epsilon  |
  | Z | $\zeta$ | zeta  |
  | H | $\eta$ | eta  |
  | $\Theta$ | $\theta$ | theta  |
  | I | $\iota$ | iota  |
  | K | $\kappa$ | kappa  |
  | $\Lambda$ | $\lambda$ | lambda  |
  | M | $\mu$ | mu  |
  | N | $\nu$ | nu  |
  | $\Xi$ | $\xi$ | xi  |
  | O | o | omicron  |
  | $\Pi$ | $\pi$ | pi  |
  | P | $\rho$ | rho  |
  | $\Sigma$ | $\sigma$ | sigma  |
  | T | $\tau$ | tau  |
  | Y | $\upsilon$ | upsilon  |
  | $\Phi$ | $\phi$ | phi  |
  | X | $\chi$ | chi  |
  | $\Psi$ | $\psi$ | psi  |
  | $\Omega$ | $\omega$ | omega  |
